text_block_list.text:
I heard that Sakura Bakushin O was absent 
due to a stomachache. She said she would 
recover soon, is she really okay?

Perhaps it was because I was thinking about 
this that I could see Sakura Bakushin O 
directly in front of me…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oya, Trainer!
choice_data_list: Hold on, what are you doing, Bakushin O!?
Hold on, what are you doing, Bakushin O!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What, you say? Is it not obvious! 
My stomachache went away, so I came to 
school!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
After all, without me as president of the 
class, there would be no… ow, ow, ow.
choice_data_list: Maybe it's not gone away after all.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No, no, that was just hunger! 
I don't have a stomachache one bit!!

…She doesn't seem to be in the best of 
shape by any means. 
For her to be here is――
choice_data_list: You need to get back to your dorm.
You need to get back to your dorm.
Are you sure you want to worry everyone?
Are you sure you want to worry everyone?

text_block_list.text:
…She doesn't seem to be in the best of 
shape by any means. 
For her to be here is――
choice_data_list: You need to get back to your dorm.
You need to get back to your dorm.
Are you sure you want to worry everyone?
Are you sure you want to worry everyone?

text_block_list.text:
I admonished her to rest easy for now, 
but――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I refuse! 
The whole class is waiting for me!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No matter what Trainer says, I'm heading 
to class!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Baku, shi―n!! 
Ow, owww…

Holding her side, Sakura Bakushin O 
dashed off to her classroom.

When I finally caught up with Sakura 
Bakushin O, she was about to put her 
hand on the door handle to the classroom.
choice_data_list: Stop right there! We're going back to the dorms!
Stop right there! We're going back to the dorms!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I refuse! 
I'm going to do my job as president――

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Nice work today～. 
Acting president, you were looking good!

Sakura Bakushin O stopped moving when 
she heard a voice coming from the 
classroom.

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: I, is that so～?

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text:
Really, really! 
You were like the perfect president!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Come on, now, you're flattering me too 
much～!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …Wh, what do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The Perfect President… Then, does this 
mean I'm out of a job!?

Sakura Bakushin O is making such feeble 
remarks, probably because she's not 
feeling well. 
What she just heard must have made 
matters even worse.
But――
choice_data_list: That's not true, take a look.
That's not true, take a look.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
…But, y'know, I'm going to miss 
Baku-chan.

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah! 
It just doesn't feel right without hearing 
that good old "Bakushin!" after all.

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
My job as class president was real tough. 
It's amazing how Baku-chan does it every 
day…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: E, everyone…!!
choice_data_list: See? I told you.
See? I told you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yes, Trainer! 
It's OK for me to be class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
For everyone in my class… 
I will continue to be the class president!

I hurriedly stopped Sakura Bakushin O, 
who was about to rush into the classroom 
in a fit of emotion, and took her back to 
the dormitory.

A few days later, Sakura Bakushin O was at 
the Academy, energetically carrying out 
her duties as class president.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Th, that's…

If she pushes myself too hard here, her 
symptoms could get worse.

I told her that as class president, it 
wouldn't be good for her to worry 
everyone――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmhmhm, that is certain!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As the class president who should be 
setting a good example, this action was 
far too rash!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm going back to my dorm for the 
day… Uuuuugh!!
choice_data_list: Let's go to the infirmary and rest for a while.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Y, yes. 
Sorry…

I took Sakura Bakushin O to the infirmary 
after her symptoms returned.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Haa… 
Is everyone in class okay?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If my absence had caused any problems, I 
would forever live to regret it…
choice_data_list: Let's just focus on healing your body first.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
However, as class president, she couldn't 
help but be concerned about what was 
going on in her class.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: If I'm… not there――

Sakura Bakushin O climbed into the bed and 
eventually fell asleep, but she was worried 
about her class until just before she 
passed out.
choice_data_list: …I guess I'll go check on the class in her place.
…I guess I'll go check on the class in her place.

text_block_list.text:
I walked away from the infirmary, careful 
not to make any noise so as not to wake 
Sakura Bakushin O.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uu…

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Oh, Baku-chan, are you awake?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Eh? 
Everyone, what are you all doing here!?

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Your Trainer told me. 
Baku-chan came to school, I heard.

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text:
Here's some tea for you! 
Get well soon, okay?

text_block_list.name: Classmate D
text_block_list.text:
It's boring without you, Baku-chan, and 
without the class president, too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Th, thank you so much! 
This should cure my stomachache in an 
instant…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Right, let's go, Trainer! 
Let's blow this stomachache away with 
some good old training!!
choice_data_list: Okay!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You can offset intense pain by getting in 
some intense training――right?
choice_data_list: Not at all…!

text_block_list.text:
Later, her classmates and I stopped the 
runaway Sakura Bakushin O.
